item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0191; 04:25AM; 4115 W Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/35Uy2Bl; Koreatown; FIRE NOW OUT: 30 firefighters extinguished fire in one unit of a row of commercials in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the unit of origin, preventing it from extending through the exposed businesses. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC11 BC18 E13 E226 E229 E26 E29 RA29 RA826 T26 T29 ; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0968; 02:30PM; 15954 W Valerio St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bb48od; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fires in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the two adjacent (detached) garages. Wind carried embers onto neighboring properties and firefighters quickly handled it to ensure no further extension. None of the primary residences were damaged. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E287 E289 E290 E88 RA81 RA90 T87 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Automobile Fire; INC#0968; 02:04PM; 15954 W Valerio St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bb48od; Van Nuys; An RV fire has extended into two adjacent garages. There are also wires down, pole to pole (DWP being notified). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E287 T87; CH8; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0770; 12:34PM; 6257 N Saloma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uKQWVI; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was well established in the converted attic space and high winds put the home on the north (Delta) side at risk. Firefighters established a handline to defend the exposed home and prevented the fire from extending / damaging it. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E73 E83 E90 RA102 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0770; 12:13PM; 6257 N Saloma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uKQWVI; Van Nuys; One story, single family dwelling with an attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E73 E83 E90 RA102 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1321; 05:26PM; 7635 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B8K05S; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. The fire extended into one adjacent unit prior to knockdown. One adult female was transported for burn injuries in *at least* serious condition. No other injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E260 E289 E77 E89 RA102 RA60 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1321; 05:04PM; 7635 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B8K05S; Sun Valley; Three story garden style apartment building with fire showing from the 3rd floor, towards the back (Bravo / Charlie corner). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E260 E289 E77 E89 RA102 RA60 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1243; 04:47PM; 2555 E Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uEjYWZ; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The initial 26 responding firefighters (prior to the assignment being filled out to a full brush response) quickly knocked down the fire, holding it to 1/4 acre with no structures damaged. All the additionally added resources are being released and the initial response will remain on scene to conduct mop up and ensure no hot spots remain. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E17 E2 E20 E202 E210 E221 E25 E290 E3 E4 E90 EM1 EM13 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA25 RA90 T10 T2 T21 T9; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Grass Fire; INC#1243; 04:19PM; 2555 E Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uEjYWZ; Boyle Heights; A[proximately 1/4 acre of grass burning uphill. There is one structure exposed at the top of the hill. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E202 E25 T2; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1209; 04:07PM; 4240 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3srrhyM; Vermont Square; Auto versus motorcycle with two patients. One sadly determined deceased on scene (age / gender unknown at this time) and one transported (condition unknown). Any queries regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3083. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; E14 E215 EM11 RA14 RA46 T15; CH4; Margaret Stewart
